title: Childcare discounts
content:
Company A partners with The Learning Care Group, KinderCare Education and The Learning Experience, national early education and child care providers, to offer team members a 10% discount on services. For more information, visit PerkSpot at https://companya.perkspot.com or call 1.866.606.6057.
KinderCare Education includes
The Learning Care Group
the following providers:
includes the following providers:
· KinderCare
· Tutor Time
· Knowledge Beginnings
· Child Time
· Champions Before and After
· Children's Courtyard
School Program
· Montessori Unlimited
· LaPetite Academy · Creative Kids
